attributes.action: tory's to cut benefit's good or bad?
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I was shocked to hear on the news that the tory's want to plan to cut the state benefits. I'm a mum of 3 witha partner who is struggling to find a job. not that he hasn't tryed. i shocked the torys want to cut the benefits becuase i'm struggling enough now with losing more money. i have had to begging companies like british gas and edf for more time to pay and been to CAB to make payment plans. our family and many other i know would be in great poverity if this does happen.
i would like to ask any body who think we should deal with the poverty of uk first before the poverty of others. it greta we do help others but we should helping our children who will one day grow up ans may run this country.
